typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceID as integer,
		VendorID as integer,
		InvoiceNumber as string,
		InvoiceDate as date,
		InvoiceTotal as float,
		PaymentTotal as float,
		CreditTotal as float,
		TermsID as string,
		InvoiceDueDate as date,
		PaymentDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ReadInvoices
ReadInvoices pivot(groupBy(VendorID),
	pivotBy(TermsID),
	{} = sum(InvoiceTotal),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot
Pivot unpivot(output(
		TermsID as integer,
		GrandInvoiceTotal as double
	),
	ungroupBy(VendorID),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot
